long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Netrin Health POC: Point of Care is a population health analytics web application tool that delivers curated, precise patient information with context-driven actionable health data without interrupting provider workflows.

Point of Care application maps patient data by identifying, synthesizing and presenting patient information from the EHR with third party sources. 

Features:
1. View Patient Summary Profiles that gives comprehensive overview of claims data including AWV due date, HCC Coding Gaps, quality gaps as well as expenditure per year.
2. View real- time Remote Patient Monitoring data at point of care
3. Track costs related to inpatient and  emergency usage

Benefits:
1. Quick installation
2. Easy integration to provider's workflow
3. Right data at right time and place
4. Improved outcomes in care
5. Close the gaps in care
